page.title: 07HOUSING
page.content: Most of the houses in the area belong to the District Council. Along at Dumbreck near Kilsyth new private houses have been built recently. Queenzieburn S.S.H.A. houses are being renovated just now. The Dumbreck terrace houses have been finished and they have started on those in Meadowside Road. All the scaffolding is up. The S.S.H.A. houses will be warmer now because they have central heating,and new windows and doors. There is a radiator in every room. The big bedroom and kitchen have double radiators. The windows don't rattle in the wind. There is a smokeless coal fire. There is strip lighting and new units in the kitchen.
